item.title: IMU-based Pain Assessment in Patients with Adhesive Capsulitis: A Machine Learning Approach
item.description: Abstract Reliable shoulder function and pain assessment tools are important for the medical management in patients with adhesive capsulitis (AC).

item.title: Assessment of Shoulder Pain for Adhesive Capsulitis Using Inertial Measurement Units
item.description: Abstract Adhesive capsulitis (AC) is a common shoulder joint disease.
